Service operations¶

These are static operations.

RGMAService¶

class rgma.RGMAService¶
static dropTupleStore(logicalName)¶

Permanently deletes a named tuple store.

Parameter:logicalName (string) – name of tuple store
static getTerminationInterval()¶

Returns the termination interval that will be applied to all resources.

Returns:the termination interval as a rgma.TimeInterval
static getVersion()¶

Returns the value of the version of the RGMA server in use.

Returns:the server version as a string
static listTupleStores()¶

Returns a list of existing tuple stores.

Returns:[ rgma.TupleStore ] objects that belong to you

TupleStore¶

class rgma.TupleStore¶

A named database used by a Producer to store tuples.

getLogicalName()¶

Returns the logical name for this tuple store.

Returns:logical name as a string
isHistory()¶

Determines if this tuple store supports history queries.

Returns:True if this tuple store supports history queries
isLatest()¶

Determines if this tuple store supports latest queries.

Returns:True if this tuple store supports latest queries
